Context:
* Partial Load faculty who have taught a specific course in a department or school can prioritize teaching that course again, as long as there hasn't been a substantial change in the course.
* Registration for priority consideration for Partial Load assignments in the next academic year takes place from January 1st to April 30th.
* Priority assignment cannot be used to teach more than 12 hours of teaching contact hours.
* To register, faculty need to click on the "Register Now" button and input their name, employee ID, and the number of weekly Partial Load hours they are interested in teaching (options: 9, 10, 11 or 12 hours).
* Faculty will receive a confirmation email after registration is complete, which will also confirm the courses they taught.
* For any questions regarding the Partial Load Registry, faculty can contact the Academic OPSEU Local Union office at [opseu556@georgebrown.ca](mailto:opseu556@georgebrown.ca) or [labourrelations@georgebrown.ca](mailto:labourrelations@georgebrown.ca).
* Contact information for George Brown College: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
* Visit the Social Media Hub for more information.
* Information on the website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation or warranty.
* Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
